name: JourneyInTheDungeon
description:
Hello guys in this project, i'll keep sharing with u every project that i've done in my GameDev journey and thank y'all for supporting me during this learning journey so today i've came with a new 2D RPG Dungeon game with a pixel style, a menu, HUD, characters skins that you can choose from and a weapon that u can upgrade and many new things. Well it's a simple game but it's not as easy as it looks, i kinda made it hard for you to win against the monsters since it has only 2 levels

Controls :ASDW or Arrows to Move Hit with SPACE Thank youu for ur support stay tuned for another projects soon!!
ENJOOYYY!!!
If you wanna support me to work on new projects i would really appreciate it
